review: This player is working out great and being able to sideload apps like XBMC makes if a great way to show my own media like photos, music, and videos on home network. Browsing is easy, lots of content, and performance is very good.

review: Easy to set up. Clear directions.  I am not good with tech, but this was something I could do on my own.  How great to be able to stream so much entertainment.
